name: Chess Trainer - Dungeons
description:
Chess Trainer - Dungeons is a combination of classic chess strategy and rogue-like
dungeon romp. Roam through five levels of increasingly more powerful
chess pieces to capture the enemy king. Chess Trainer - Dungeons is suitable for both
novices and masters at chess, challenging each player to their limit.
Ponder the best move as long as needed in turn-based Run Through mode.
Trap and capture the marked pieces in Assassin mode. And if you love
action, timed Blitz mode turns up the pressure as clock ticks away on
each move!

Features
- Randomly generated dungeons give an new experience in every game
- Three game modes (Run Through, Assassin, Blitz)
- Four difficulty levels on each mode

Jun 2018 - Chess Hack name changed to Chess Trainer - Dungeons
